intro: Yantra India Limited has announced around 3979 Trade Apprentice vacancies.
jobDescription: YIL invites online applications for Trade Apprentice training across India under multiple trades and categories.
responsibilities: Review the official notification and role expectations carefully.
Prepare resume and required documents before applying.
Complete application within deadline and track further updates.
minQualifications: Any additional requirements mentioned in the official listing.
prefQualifications: Relevant project, internship, or domain exposure.
howToApply: Visit the official recruitment portal, register, complete the form, and submit before 03 March 2026.
author: StudentTechProjects Team
imageAlt: Yantra India Trade Apprentice Recruitment 2026 at Yantra India Limited (YIL)
